name: jkpark
description: JK Park's Personal Package Manager (Bun Powered)

scripts.build: bun build ./src/index.ts --outdir ./dist --target node --bundle && echo '#!/usr/bin/env node' | cat - ./dist/index.js > ./dist/index.tmp.js && mv ./dist/index.tmp.js ./dist/index.js && chmod +x ./dist/index.js

author: Jeff
